name: Logitech H800 Wireless Headset - Bluetooth Enabled | Dell USA
description: Redefine the way you communicate, with the H800 Wireless Headset from Logitech®. It features Plug-and-forget nano-receiver which you can plug it in once and forget about. With 2.4 GHz wireless, roam up to 12 m (40 ft.) from your PC using the tiny, leave-in nano receiver. Easily connect to and switch between devices like your PC, tablet, smartphone and the built-in equalizer optimizes your sound whether you’re chatting or listening to music. With Bluetooth® technology, it’s easy to pair your headset with your smartphone or tablet. Plus, the lightweight headset folds up like sunglasses when you’re ready to hit the road. Moreover, with noise-canceling microphone you won’t have to compete with background noise to be heard which means crystal clear calls with work, family and friends. So, whether you're at home or on the go, you can enjoy wireless, hands free calls while taking care of other tasks at the same time.
